Hero.title: Wildscope: AI Wildlife Tracking & Outdoor Exploration
Hero.subtitle: Your ultimate adventure companion for identifying species, exploring nature trails, and discovering wildlife habitats with offline maps and AI recognition.

About.title: The Ultimate Wildlife Identification App
About.paragraph1: Wildscope is your AI-powered companion for discovering and identifying nature. Whether you're hiking in the wilderness, bird watching in a city park, or exploring remote ecosystems from your home, Wildscope connects you with wildlife and natural habitats in meaningful ways.
About.paragraph2: From casual nature walks to serious wildlife tracking expeditions, Wildscope combines cutting-edge AI technology, comprehensive offline hiking maps, and a global community of outdoor enthusiasts and nature lovers.

Features.title: Advanced Wildlife Tracking Features
Features.feature1_desc: Navigate trails with confidence using our GPS-enabled waypoint compass, access detailed topographic maps offline, and utilize our comprehensive species database—everything outdoor adventurers need, accessible even without internet connection.
Features.feature2_desc: Instantly identify plants, animals, and fungi in your surroundings with our advanced AI recognition system. Log wildlife sightings, access detailed species information including habitat maps, migration patterns, and contribute to important citizen science biodiversity projects.
Features.feature3_desc: Join a vibrant network of hikers, birders, and wildlife photographers. Discover species hotspots from experienced trackers, follow their marked hiking trails, and share your own nature observations to inspire fellow outdoor enthusiasts.
Features.feature4_desc: Track wildlife in your current location or virtually explore distant ecosystems and biodiversity hotspots from home. All hiking trails, species data and detailed terrain maps work completely offline—perfect for remote wilderness adventures without cellular coverage.
Features.feature5_desc: Enhance your wildlife knowledge through engaging species identification quizzes and location-specific biodiversity challenges. Test your outdoor skills with survival scenarios and create custom nature exploration challenges based on real habitats and ecosystems.
Features.feature6_desc: Get expert assistance from your AI wildlife identification companion that understands your natural surroundings. Upload images for instant species recognition, learn about nearby wildlife habitats, and receive personalized guidance for your outdoor adventures and wildlife photography.

FAQ.title: FAQ Section
FAQ.question1: Do I need internet to use Wildscope?
FAQ.answer1: Only for loading new areas and using advanced features like AI species ID and community sharing. Once an area is downloaded, most features work offline.
FAQ.question2: How is it different from iNaturalist or Seek?
FAQ.answer2: Wildscope is designed not just for identifying species, but for immersive exploration — online and offline, casual or adventurous. It's built for everyone, not just scientists.
FAQ.question3: What kind of places does Wildscope cover?
FAQ.answer3: Forests, parks, trails, coastlines, deserts — and even urban green spaces. Anywhere nature exists, Wildscope helps you connect with it.
